nameEntry.part: The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum

biogHist.abstract: The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum at Nailsworth in South Australia, formerly held records related to the Salvation Army Girls Home, Fullarton (1901 - 1986), the Salvation Army Boys Home, Eden Park (Mount Barker) (1900 - 1982) and the Salvation Army Boys Home, Kent Town (1929 - 1972). In 2012 this Centre closed and all records related to former residents were transferred to the Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters at Blackburn in Victoria.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Records of The Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton, The Salvation Army Australia Southern Territory Territorial Archives and Museum (1900? - 1980s)

descriptiveNote.p: Some of the Records of The Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton were held by The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum. In 2012 the Heritage Centre closed and the records were transferred to the Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Archives and Museum.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Records of The Salvation Army Boys' Home, Eden Park (1957? - 1980s)

descriptiveNote.p: The Records of The Salvation Army Boys' Home, Eden Park was held by The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum. In 2012 the Heritage Centre closed and the records were transferred to the Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters in Blackburn, Victoria.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Kent Town Boys' Home History Book (1932 - 1972)

descriptiveNote.p: The Kent Town Boys Home History Book was held by The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum. In 2012 the Heritage Centre closed and the History Book was transferred to the Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters in Blackburn, Victoria.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: The Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters (2012 - )

descriptiveNote.p: The Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters holds most records that previously were held by the Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum', in Find & Connect - South Australia,

bibref.title: The Salvation Army Heritage Centre, Archives and Museum
